reviewsJson.markdown:
**RDA**/ Velocity 

**% Used**/ 5 

**Coil**/ Clapton **W**/ 45 

**Steep Time**/2 weeks**Wicking**/ Full     
                   
**PG/VG** 50/50 **Nic%** 0    

**Mouth Feel** - Light on the palate and nose. Not very dense I would give it a 2 out of 10, with no throat hit.                           

**Flavor Properties**- Cream whipped to perfection, ( just before it turns into butter ), it's a light fluffy Dairy moderately sweet with none of the eggy or vanilla properties you find another creams and custards.         

 **Relatable Flavors** - Reminds me of Cool Whip, or drinking a glass of heavy cream.         

**Position In The Recipe** - Given its light density, I believe this is going to be most useful as an accent to other creams give them up fluffy mouthfeel.

**Pairings** - Other creams, bakeries,  chocolates, dark berry flavors, and a few nuts like pistachio, or hazelnut should really help make this flavor pop.
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Whipped Cream
